.. _inline_urls:

===========
Inline URLs
===========

A paragraph with inline URLs, like `http\://ezcomponents.org`__ and inline
*markup*, also with mail links to `mail@example.com`__ and URLs with some
different scheme like `ftp\://user\:pass@example.org`__.

__ http://ezcomponents.org
__ mailto:mail@example.com
__ ftp://user:pass@example.org
